This #FloodActionWeek make it your mission to know what to do in a flood. 

Together, we can become a nation that‚Äôs resilient to our changing climate.

tweets.text:
Floods can destroy your most treasured possessions.

Taking a few simple steps now can help protect your home and family.

Don‚Äôt lose what you love to a flood: https://t.co/xKGAQ9Oqsr

#PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/AWlCNioPNv

Restored riffles and pools, backwater, ponds, point-bars and more river dynamics; quite the river & campus transformation. @AquaUoS collaboration with @StaffsWildlife @WildStoke @EnvAgencyMids and @SanctusLtd for #StaffsSUNRISE https://t.co/zcsRmaSwCr

We're working with @EnvAgency to deliver #NFM flood management techniques, slowing the flow of water from the hills to reduce flooding, across catchments in @EnvAgencyNW - including the construction of 200 mini-dams in Stalybridge #FloodActionWeek 

https://t.co/sNySGMrwcM https://t.co/NKOe0XYNGp

@SalfordHydro @AquaUoS @StaffsWildlife @WildStoke @EnvAgencyMids @SanctusLtd From today
@RRC @ECRRnetwork @WildTroutTrust https://t.co/Dth1unqak3

TRENT TRANSFORMED
Aerial view of 1.5ha of new functional wet floodplain and over 500m of bifurcating channel  at Staffs Uni campus in Stoke
Even these massively degraded systems can be rejuvenated with vision 
@StaffsWildlife @SoTCityCouncil @EnvAgency @SalfordScience @StaffsUni https://t.co/rss99g49FK

We're hosting our very first virtual resident meeting for the Otley Flood Alleviation scheme on Wednesday 18 November, from 4pm. Join us, @BAMNuttall and @EnvAgencyYNE as we give an update and answer all your questions. Sign up here https://t.co/4x3QvxTUfv #flooding #Leeds https://t.co/VV2L5pPF12

urls.title: Eye On Calderdale
urls.description: Your one stop website for up to date information about flooding, weather and traffic disruptions across the Borough of Calderdale.

tweets.text:
Read about the progress being made on constructing #MytholmroydFAS in the latest bulletin https://t.co/HgdBp7TncO

Glass has been installed in the flood wall at Burnley Rd 

For tips on making a flood plan visit: https://t.co/wwueotBnkz
#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/HjsX62lQUx

Tussocks! These soil forming structures in #culmgrassland disrupt surface flow pathways, storing and delaying water which would otherwise wash into rivers @DevonWildlife @EnvAgencySW https://t.co/t6LItdPvRc

Access to embankment in #Burton-upon-Trent is now open as part of ¬£30m project to better protect 4,500 homes & 1,000 businesses #flooding

The path through Toad Hole nature reserve is also open & the project should be completed next Spring #flood details  https://t.co/6kSZ8Gu3cQ https://t.co/hoyvmzntD7

It's #FloodActionWeek and the @EnvAgency want to encourage more people to be aware and prepared about the risks of flooding to their home, including using an online postcode checker to see flood risks where you are https://t.co/9Hh6lbKbZ0 #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/NnDWBlC7AE

It's probably time for a brew now ‚òïÔ∏è & if you're in the mood for some upbeat, inspiring chat, take a listen to @Sophie_COO & @Eldo36 talking about #environmental #data & how they're building on #linkeddata from @EnvAgency to combat waste crime.

https://t.co/YD413u2WyL

Study 1: Small #airpollution rise causes 11% increase in Covid19 deaths. Study 2: 15% global Covid19 deaths caused by dirty air
UK Govt "No need to stick to 
@WHO air pollution limits in the new #EnvironmentBill"
Demand better! https://t.co/WYJSFXtKHt

https://t.co/SjFLeFjxrn

tweets.text: Never drive through flood water. Just 1 egg-cupful of water sucked into your engine can wreck your vehicle and leave you stranded. üöóüåä If you come across a flooded road, find an alternative route. Visit https://t.co/29saU23JrY #FloodActionweek #PrepareActSurvive. https://t.co/IkrtSrprUh

tweets.text:
#TeamEA  remain committed during lockdown to reducing waste crime. 

Our Enforcement Team have been working with partners @StaffsPolice to identify illegal activity.  

If you suspect illegal activity report it anonymously to Crimestoppers on 0800 555 111 #wastecrime https://t.co/sIp5AHnkRA

tweets.text: A week of striking stats... There are 152 @EnvAgencyNW  #flood warning areas in #Lancashire. 75 of these have under 50% sign up from those able to receive them! Pls do sign up  https://t.co/3Z355LqJ1W & spread the word #PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/jihX3Rv4Ij

Do you know what to do in a flood? Make sure you know the simple steps to take if a Flood Alert, Flood Warning, or Severe Flood Warning is issued in your area üëá

https://t.co/CsUTBjY5Ft

#FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/sXatK90YWd
Fantastic seeing these NFM measures holding back water and slowing the flow. Thanks @wendybufton! https://t.co/pdcYzwLuuF

@DerbyshireRCT @DerbyshireFRS @EnvAgency Omg, at what point did they think that burning tyres would go unnoticed . Hope a big fine and the cost of cleaning it up goes to them . No respect for the environment ü§¨

Some great drone footage and imagery of the NFM interventions and wider Isbourne catchment. Thanks to the guys @worcester_uni. Click link to see pano. @josieellalynch @Worldwidevillan @worcscc @EnvAgencyMids @isbournecatch #nfm #nfmbydrone #slowtheflow https://t.co/BiDQWhYaFP https://t.co/90nnMB2AxC
